title: Bajaj Finance, Biocon & more: Top stocks to buy on December 9 — Check list
description: JP Morgan maintains a neutral stance on Bajaj Finance, citing strategic growth plans and market share ambitions. Goldman Sachs also holds a neutral rating for Biocon, following its planned integration with Biocon Biologics. Kotak Institutional Equities initiates coverage on Tata Capital with an 'add' rating, anticipating strong loan growth.

title: Congress betrayed national song under pressure from Jinnah: PM Modi
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi accused the Congress of betraying 'Vande Mataram' under pressure from Mohammed Ali Jinnah, citing appeasement politics. He highlighted Mahatma Gandhi's praise for the song, noting its significance as a unifying force against British rule. Modi criticized the Congress's 1937 decision to limit the song's recital, linking it to the eventual division of India.

title: Trump’s former lawyer Alina Habba resigns as U.S. attorney for New Jersey after court ruling
description: Alina Habba is one of several acting U.S. attorneys around the country to have their appointments by the Trump administration challenged on the basis that they stayed in the temporary jobs longer than the law allows.

title: Honduras resumes releasing election results, Trump-backed Asfura maintains lead
description: With 97% of the ballots tallied, Asfura, a 67-year-old former Tegucigalpa mayor, had 40.52% of the vote as election officials resumed releasing updated results for the November 30 vote

title: Can't hear out holders before declaring a/cs fraud: RBI, SBI
description: Banks and RBI informed the Supreme Court that personal hearings before declaring accounts fraudulent are unfeasible due to a surge in cases. With tens of thousands of frauds annually, the sheer volume makes individual hearings impractical, potentially hindering the fraud declaration process. The regulator emphasized operational challenges and left the decision to banks' discretion.

‘India shouldn't be dumping rice’: Trump signals fresh tariffs as US farmers decry cheap imports
description: US President Donald Trump is considering new tariffs on agricultural imports, including Indian rice and Canadian fertilizers, to support domestic farmers facing competition from cheaper foreign goods.  He vowed to address alleged dumping of Indian rice and explore severe tariffs on Canadian fertilizers to boost local production, amidst ongoing trade negotiations and economic pressures.

description: Ranveer Singh's latest film, 'Dhurandhar,' is a box office sensation, raking in ₹126 crore in its first four days. Inspired by true events, the Aditya Dhar directorial has surpassed the lifetime earnings of 'Goliyon Ki Rasleela Ram-Leela.' The movie has already become Singh's highest opener and the second-highest opener of 2025, solidifying its place as a major hit.

Supreme Court allows SC certificate for girl based on caste of mom, not non-SC dad
description: The Supreme Court has allowed an SC certificate for a minor based on her mother's caste, even though her father is non-SC. This decision, made to prevent academic hardship, raises questions about whether children should inherit caste from their mother. The court acknowledged the evolving societal norms, hinting at a potential shift in established practices.

title: Goa nightclub inferno: Owners Saurabh, Gaurav Luthra flee to Thailand within hours
description: Goa nightclub owners Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra fled to Thailand within hours of a deadly blaze at their establishment, the DGP revealed. A Look-Out Notice has been issued, and authorities are coordinating with Interpol for their arrest. The brothers, who expressed grief online, are accused of avoiding the police investigation into the tragedy.

description: Indian cricketer Smriti Mandhana has officially called off her wedding with composer Palash Muchhal, requesting privacy for both families.  While the exact reasons remain undisclosed, Mandhana emphasised her commitment to representing India.  This follows an earlier postponement due to a family health emergency.  She seeks to focus on her career.

title: IND vs SA: Bumrah on the cusp of historic milestone; a first by Indian bowler
description: Jasprit Bumrah is on the verge of significant T20I milestones as India faces South Africa. He needs just one wicket to reach 100 T20I wickets, a feat that would also make him the first Indian to achieve a century of wickets in all international formats. Additionally, Bumrah is nearing 500 combined international wickets across formats.

IndiGo has acknowledged the issues, attributing them to recent duty requirements and changes in their winter travel timetable.

title: Tatas to make chips, laptops for Intel in Gujarat, Assam

This significant collaboration aims to boost India's semiconductor ambitions, enhance cost-effectiveness, and accelerate market entry for Intel, tapping into the nation's burgeoning AI PC demand.

title: China must assure us our citizens won't be harassed: India
description: India has demanded assurances from China that its citizens won't face selective harassment after an Arunachal Pradesh resident was reportedly mistreated at Shanghai airport. New Delhi strongly protested the incident, reaffirming Arunachal's status as an integral part of India. The MEA advised Indian nationals to exercise caution when traveling to or transiting through China.

description: As West Bengal gears up for elections, opposition parties have rallied against the government, alleging that the Vande Mataram discussion is a calculated distraction from more urgent matters at hand. Priyanka Gandhi Vadra joined the fray, pointing out Prime Minister Modi's faltering support and ineffective strategies, while invoking Jawaharlal Nehru's firm opposition to communal favoritism linked to the national anthem.

title: Give Vande Mataram same status as Jana Gana: Rajnath Singh
description: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh proposed adding a fundamental duty to the Constitution, mandating equal respect for 'Vande Mataram' as the national anthem. He accused Congress of communalizing the song due to appeasement politics, urging parliamentarians to restore its glory and honor its author. Singh highlighted historical attempts to truncate the song, deeming it an injustice to national identity.

title: Vande Mataram debate done with eye on Bengal poll, says TMC
description: In a fiery session in Parliament, Trinamool Congress slammed the government for allegedly using the 'Vande Mataram' discourse as a political distraction ahead of the West Bengal elections, branding it as a 'poorly executed farce.' MPs voiced their concerns over the BJP's 'polarizing' tactics, while Akhilesh Yadav from SP labelled their moves as 'nationally contentious.

The clip, showing the rapper and NFL star in a close embrace, has sparked widespread debate among fans, with reactions ranging from adoration to skepticism about their relationship's authenticity. This public display has intensified interest in both celebrities' personal lives.

title: Explain Kashmir book ban, HC tells LG admin, Centre
description: The Jammu and Kashmir High Court has granted the administration and the Centre three months to respond to petitions challenging a ban on 25 Kashmir-related books. The ban, imposed by the home department, claims the books promote a "false narrative" and "secessionism." A three-judge bench will hear the petitions, which argue the ban violates free speech guarantees.

He noted the AAIB's meeting with the NTSB as encouraging, suggesting significant findings. Andrews highlighted concerns about a known coupling issue potentially causing electrical problems, evidenced by survivor accounts of flickering lights.

He is known for his direct style and strong opinions on faith and culture.

The blaze, likely originating from across the border, is spreading rapidly due to dry conditions and has triggered multiple landmine blasts in forward areas without any reported injuries.

Cross-dressing crook: Burglar dressed as woman arrested in Delhi; 14-day chase busted heist
description: Police apprehended a 24-year-old man in Uttam Nagar after he allegedly broke into a house in Mohan Garden. Disguised as a woman to avoid CCTV detection, he stole jewellery, watches, and a handicam with an associate. The arrest has helped solve ten theft and snatching cases. Recovered items include silver anklets, a handicam, and five mobile phones.

title: Want to use your old smartphone as a home security camera: How to set it up
description: Old smartphones can become home security cameras. This guide shows how to use an old phone with a special app. You can monitor your home, children, or pets easily. This is a cost-effective way to enhance home security. Simply install an app on both phones and pair them. Place the camera strategically for best coverage.

title: Bill Gates' daughter gets $30M for AI app: Gates says won't invest; works helpdesk
description: Phoebe Gates' artificial intelligence shopping startup, Phia, has raised $30 million in new funding. This investment values the company at $180 million. Bill Gates, Phoebe's father, has supported the venture with his time and experience. Phia aims to make online shopping smarter and more sustainable. The app offers price comparisons, discounts, and secondhand options.

title: Gracie Hunt stuns with runway-ready style in intense mint training session
description: Kansas City Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt showcases her fitness journey, blending athlete-level intensity with stylish presentation in her latest Instagram workout. The 26-year-old influencer demonstrated a full-body circuit, highlighting her strength, discipline, and ability to make workouts visually engaging. Her posts inspire followers by proving fitness can be both fierce and fun, reflecting her mission beyond her family name.

title: Travis Turner case: Veteran cop shares chilling new theory from the woods
description: A missing Virginia football coach, Travis Turner, may never be found. He vanished from his home on November 20. Authorities charged him with child pornography offenses. A law enforcement expert states dense woods and wildlife make recovery difficult. Search teams are using advanced tools, but success remains uncertain. A reward is offered for information leading to his arrest.

title: Kournikova & Iglesias Net Worth 2025: Tennis, music, and business earnings
description: Tennis star Anna Kournikova and music icon Enrique Iglesias boast a combined net worth of $160 million in 2025. While Kournikova's fame transcended her $4 million prize money through lucrative endorsements, Iglesias' wealth stems from over 130 million record sales and global tours. Both have strategically invested in Miami real estate, contributing to their substantial shared fortune.

title: After a $70bn hit, Zuckerberg concedes his biggest bet is 'not working'
description: Meta is reportedly planning significant budget cuts for its Metaverse division, potentially slashing it by 30% as part of its 2026 annual planning. This move follows over $70 billion in losses for the Metaverse vision and a lack of consumer interest in its VR products. The company is now prioritizing its artificial intelligence efforts.
